titles.title: Send Thou O Lord To Every Place

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Send Thou O Lord to ev'ry place Swift messengers before Thy face The heralds of Thy wondrous grace Where Thou Thyself wilt come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Send men whose eyes have seen the King Men in whose ears His sweet words ring Send such Thy lost ones home to bring Send them where Thou wilt come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To bring good news to souls in sin The bruised and broken hearts to win In every place to bring them in Where Thou Thyself wilt come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gird each one with the Spirit's sword The sword of Thine own deathless word And make them conquerors conquering Lord Where Thou Thyself wilt come{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Raise up O Lord the Holy Ghost From this broad land a mighty host Their war-cry We will seek the lost Where Thou O Christ wilt come{/lang-eng}
